thread.section_title: Ramtown Carpet One Floor & Home Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ramtown Carpet One Floor & Home | www.ramtownfloors.com
thread.title: Bruce and Betty Baker
thread.title_full: Ramtown Carpet One Floor & Home reviewed by Bruce and Betty Baker

author: Bruce and Betty Baker
title: Bruce and Betty Baker
text:
From the time we met Nancy at the Home show at Brookdale CC we have been happy with the attention we have received. The girls spent time with us to pick out the best floor, type & color for our kitchen renovation.
Nancy kept us informed about price and instillation.
Tom provided us with a great installer, Tom also, who did a fabulous job putting down our chosen product.
Tom was very attentive during the instillation by not only coming to the house during the instillation but also to inspect the job after it was completed.
We are VERY PLEASED with our new floor
Betty Baker
